00014 huffman_table fadc_run_huffman;
00015 huffman_table fadc_small_huffman;

00020 void fadc_optimize()
00021 {
00022   huffman_optimize_tree(&fadc_run_huffman);
00023   huffman_optimize_tree(&fadc_small_huffman);
00024 
00025   save_huffman("/Compression/Lossless/FADC/Huffman/Run", &fadc_run_huffman);
00026   save_huffman("/Compression/Lossless/FADC/Huffman/Small", &fadc_small_huffman);
00027 }

00029 void fadc_load()
00030 {
00031   huffman_init_default(&fadc_run_huffman, 32);
00032   huffman_init_default(&fadc_small_huffman, 9);
00033 
00034   load_huffman("/Compression/Lossless/FADC/Huffman/Run", &fadc_run_huffman);
00035   load_huffman("/Compression/Lossless/FADC/Huffman/Small", &fadc_small_huffman);
00036 
00037   int size = sizeof(BOOL);
00038   db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Compression/Lossless/FADC/Enabled", &should_compress_fadc,
00039     &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
00040 }
00041 
00042 int encode_fadc(fadc_word * input, int input_size, io_buffer * output)
00043 {
00044   // Encode the flash ADC data by 
00045   // 1. Splitting the four channels.
00046   // 2. Taking successive differences between samples within a channel.
00047   // 3. Run-length encoding the differences.
00048   // 4. Huffman coding the results.
00049 
00050   int num_fadc_samples = input_size;
00051 
00052   int diffs[ /*num_fadc_samples */ 1024];
00053 
00054   for (int chan = 0; chan < num_fadc_channels; chan++) {
00055     int prev_sample = 0;
00056 
00057     for (int i = 0; i < num_fadc_samples; i++) {
00058       diffs[i] = ((int) input[i].channel[chan]) - prev_sample;
00059       prev_sample = input[i].channel[chan];
00060     }
00061 
00062     for (int i = 0; i < num_fadc_samples; i++) {
00063 
00064       if (diffs[i] == 0) {
00065         // count the run length
00066         int run_length = 0;
00067         while (i + run_length < num_fadc_samples && run_length < 31) {
00068           if (diffs[i + run_length] == 0) {
00069             run_length++;
00070           } else {
00071             break;
00072           }
00073         }
00074 
00075         i += run_length - 1;
00076 
00077         io_buffer_put(output, 0, 1);
00078         huffman_put_symbol(&fadc_run_huffman, output, run_length);
00079       } else if (diffs[i] <= 4 && diffs[i] >= -4) {
00080         io_buffer_put(output, 2, 2);
00081         huffman_put_symbol(&fadc_small_huffman, output, diffs[i] + 4);
00082       } else {
00083         io_buffer_put(output, 3, 2);
00084         io_buffer_put(output, diffs[i] + 256, 9);
00085       }
00086     }
00087   }
00088 
00089   return flush_output_buffer(output);
00090 }
00091 
00092 int fadc_compress(fadc_word * input, int input_size, unsigned char *output, int userParam)
00093 {
00094   input_size /= sizeof(fadc_word);
00095 
00096   rle_bits_setup();
00097 
00098   io_buffer output_buffer;
00099 
00100   // store size of input data
00101   int *uncompressed_size_p = (int *) output;
00102   *uncompressed_size_p = input_size;
00103   output += sizeof(int);
00104 
00105   // reserve space for the size of the compressed data
00106   int *compressed_time_size_p = (int *) output;
00107   output += sizeof(int);
00108 
00109   // compress samples
00110   start_output_buffer(&output_buffer, output);
00111   int compressed_size = encode_fadc(input, input_size, &output_buffer);
00112   output += compressed_size;
00113 
00114   // store size of compressed times
00115   *compressed_time_size_p = compressed_size;
00116 
00117   return compressed_size + 2 * sizeof(int);
00118 }
00119 
00120 int decode_fadc(io_buffer * input, fadc_word * output, int input_size)
00121 {
00122   int num_fadc_samples = input_size;
00123 
00124   int diffs[ /*num_fadc_samples */ 1024];
00125 
00126   for (int chan = 0; chan < num_fadc_channels; chan++) {
00127 
00128     for (int i = 0; i < num_fadc_samples; i++) {
00129       int type_code_1 = io_buffer_get(input, 1);
00130       if (type_code_1 == 0) {
00131         int run_length = huffman_get_symbol(&fadc_run_huffman, input);
00132 
00133         for (int j = 0; j < run_length; j++) {
00134           diffs[i + j] = 0;
00135         }
00136 
00137         i += run_length - 1;
00138 
00139         if (i < 0 || i >= num_fadc_samples) {
00140           printf("WTF?\n");
00141         }
00142 
00143 
00144       } else {
00145         int type_code_2 = io_buffer_get(input, 1);
00146         if (type_code_2 == 0) {
00147           diffs[i] = huffman_get_symbol(&fadc_small_huffman, input) - 4;
00148         } else {
00149           diffs[i] = io_buffer_get(input, 9) - 256;
00150         }
00151       }
00152     }
00153 
00154     int prev_sample = 0;
00155 
00156     for (int i = 0; i < num_fadc_samples; i++) {
00157       output[i].channel[chan] = prev_sample + diffs[i];
00158       prev_sample = output[i].channel[chan];
00159     }
00160   }
00161 
00162   return num_fadc_samples;
00163 }

00165 int fadc_expand(unsigned char *input, int input_size, fadc_word * output, int userParam)
00166 {
00167   // 
00168   // Uncompress the data produced by caen_compress().
00169   // 
00170 
00171   rle_bits_setup();
00172 
00173   // Get uncompressed data size
00174   int *uncompressed_size_p = (int *) input;
00175   int uncompressed_size = *uncompressed_size_p;
00176   input += sizeof(int);
00177   input_size -= sizeof(int);
00178 
00179   // Get size of compressed data
00180   int *compressed_size_p = (int *) input;
00181   int compressed_size = *compressed_size_p;
00182   input += sizeof(int);
00183   input_size -= sizeof(int);
00184 
00185   // Uncompress data
00186   io_buffer input_buffer;
00187   start_input_buffer(&input_buffer, input);
00188   decode_fadc(&input_buffer, output, uncompressed_size);
00189   input += compressed_size;
00190   input_size -= compressed_size;
00191 
00192   return uncompressed_size * sizeof(fadc_word);
00193 }
